title: [管理]PlotMe——地皮插件[1.2.5-1.12.2]
author: ColorsWind
txt_content: 本帖最后由 ColorsWind 于 2020-3-5 18:09 编辑        简介 另外本插件官方已经停更，较新版本服务端考虑使用PlotSquare代替. PlotMe是一个多世界的地皮管理插件，每个地皮只能由其所有者进行操作，且这个插件生成的路面是无法被破坏的。可以共享给好朋友，一起建筑，创造服/生存服必备。 本帖只介绍最新的版本，较老的服务器（无UUID）请看1169楼 对于离线服务器，你只能使用0.16或以上的版本。 新版本特性： 支持保护实体地皮生成器和管理分离全面支持UUID 0.16版本移除的创世神保护 插件下载: PlotMe-Core 管理地皮的 PlotMe-DefaultGenerator 地皮生成器 DynmapPlotMe 卫星地图拓展(可选用）复制代码稳定版0.16.3 PlotMe.zip (439.93 KB, 下载次数: 36272) 2016-7-24 19:43 上传 点击文件名下载附件 开发版0.17.1 (支持创世神地皮保护) PlotMe-Core-dev.jar (315.02 KB, 下载次数: 12720) 2015-7-24 08:16 上传 点击文件名下载附件 PlotMe-DefaultGenerator-dev.jar (46.23 KB, 下载次数: 13165) 2015-7-24 08:16 上传 点击文件名下载附件 站内重置版 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-553504-1-1.html 旧版本0.13b 无UUID PlotMe0.13b.zip (189.58 KB, 下载次数: 74907) 2014-7-9 12:46 上传 点击文件名下载附件 1.5.2,1.7.2（1.6.X）完全汉化版 本版本介绍在 1169楼 汉化文本 适用于新版本： captions.yml (11.24 KB, 下载次数: 19086) 2016-7-24 19:44 上传 点击文件名下载附件 丢进.\plugins\Plot-Core 覆盖原文件 来自@酷车手BB弹 Chinese.zip (4.04 KB, 下载次数: 98773) 2014-8-18 09:10 上传 点击文件名下载附件 汉化文本 丢进.\plugins\PlotMe 覆盖原文件 来自http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-85971-1-1.html 使用方法（多世界安装） 第一步-准备插件 下载好对应版本的多世界插件和PlotMe核心和生成器 MuLtiverse-Core传送门 Mulitworld传送门 Vault，WorldGuard ， WorldEdit (可选) 第二步-安装插件 把依赖（可选）插件和Plot-Core&PlotMe-DefaultGenerator丢进/plugins. 第三步-生成配置 启动一次服务器，目的是生成配置文件。启动完成后关闭服务器。 第四步-编辑配置 打开/plugins/Plot-Core/config.yml -核心配置 /plugins/PlotMe-DefaultGenerator/config.yml -生成器配置复制代码（如果不需要可以跳过）第五步-创建世界 创造地皮世界plotworld为默认世界名（可在配置中修改）Muitiverse-Core /mv create plotworld normal -g PlotMe-DefaultGenerator复制代码MulitWorld/mw create plotworld plugin:PlotMe-DefaultGenerator复制代码 命令 /plotme claim 为别人认领你脚下的地皮 /plotme auto 自动认领顺序下一个地皮 /plotme home[:#] 设置家，如果你有多个: /plotme home 会带你去你1号地皮. /plotme home:2 会带你去2号地皮. /plotme home[:#] 去别人家/plotme home id 会带你去他的1号地皮. /plotme home:2 id 会带你去他的2号地皮. /plotme list 列出你的地皮 /plotme list 列出别人的地皮 /plotme info 列出你站在的地皮的信息(包括地皮id, 主人,地形, 日期, 结束 帮助). /plotme comment 评论一下（留言）到当前的地皮 /plotme comments 查看各种留言 /plotme biome 查看目前地形 /plotme biome 改变当前地皮的地形 /plotme biomelist 列出可设置地形 /plotme tp 传送到某个地皮 /plotme id 查看当前地皮的id和坐标 /plotme clear 将地皮初始化到认领时候的样子（地形哦~慎用） /plotme reset 还原地皮（慎用，解除占领的） /plotme add 给某个玩家在你地皮建造的权限 /plotme remove 移除某个玩家在你地皮建造的权限 /plotme setowner 过户你的领地给玩家 复制代码 精简权限 plotme.use 基本权限（给玩家） plotme.admin 管理权限 plotme.limit.N 最大领取N块地皮（给玩家） 复制代码完整权限     plotme.use:       描述: Gives default user commands       子权限:         plotme.use.nameplot: true         plotme.use.claim: true         plotme.use.auto: true         plotme.use.home: true         plotme.use.info: true         plotme.use.biome: true         plotme.use.clear: true         plotme.use.list: true         plotme.use.buy: true         plotme.use.sell: true         plotme.use.auction: true         plotme.use.bid: true         plotme.use.dispose: true         plotme.use.done: true         plotme.use.deny: true         plotme.use.undeny: true         plotme.use.reset: true         plotme.use.middle: true         plotme.limit.1: true     plotme.admin:       描述: Gives default administrator commands       子权限:         plotme.admin.claim.other: true         plotme.admin.home.other: true         plotme.admin.tp: true         plotme.admin.clear: true         plotme.admin.reset: true         plotme.admin.add: true         plotme.admin.remove: true         plotme.admin.setowner: true         plotme.admin.move: true         plotme.admin.weanywhere: true         plotme.admin.list: true         plotme.admin.buy: true         plotme.admin.sell: true         plotme.admin.auction: true         plotme.admin.dispose: true         plotme.admin.done: true         plotme.admin.addtime: true         plotme.admin.expired: true         plotme.admin.deny: true         plotme.admin.undeny: true         plotme.admin.bypassdeny: true         plotme.admin.buildanywhere: true         plotme.admin.reload: true         plotme.admin.middle: true     plotme.unblock.*:       描述: Unblocks a certain item that was blocked in the config     plotme.use.middle:       描述: Gives the middle command     plotme.use.buy:       描述: Gives the buy command     plotme.use.sell:       描述: Gives the sell command     plotme.use.auction:       描述: Gives the auction command     plotme.use.bid:       描述: Gives the bid command     plotme.use.dispose:       描述: Gives the dispose command     plotme.use.done:       描述: Gives the done command     plotme.use.claim:       描述: Gives the claim command     plotme.use.auto:       描述: Gives the auto claim command     plotme.use.reset:       描述: Gives the reset command for plots owned     plotme.use.home:       描述: Gives the home command     plotme.use.info:       描述: Gives the info command     plotme.use.biome:       描述: Gives the biome and biomelist command     plotme.use.clear:       描述: Gives the clear command for plots owned     plotme.use.list:       描述: Gives the list command     plotme.use.add:       描述: Gives the add command for plots owned     plotme.use.deny:       描述: Gives the deny command for plots owned     plotme.use.remove:       描述: Gives the remove command for plots owned     plotme.use.undeny:       描述: Gives the undeny command for plots owned     plotme.use.protect:       描述: Gives the protect command     plotme.use.nameplot:       描述: Gives the player the ability to name their plot.     plotme.limit.*:       描述: Gives unlimited plots     plotme.limit.1:       描述: Gives 1 plot     plotme.limit.5:       描述: Gives 5 plots     plotme.limit.10:       描述: Gives 10 plots     plotme.admin.claim.other:       描述: Gives the claim command for any player     plotme.admin.home.other:       描述: Gives the home command for any players     plotme.admin.middle:       描述: Gives the middle command for any plots     plotme.admin.tp:       描述: Gives the tp command     plotme.admin.clear:       描述: Gives the clear command for any plots     plotme.admin.reset:       描述: Gives the reset command     plotme.admin.add:       描述: Gives the add command for any plots     plotme.admin.deny:       描述: Gives the deny command for any plots     plotme.admin.remove:       描述: Gives the remove command for any plots     plotme.admin.undeny:       描述: Gives the undeny command for any plots     plotme.admin.bypassdeny:       描述: Allows to enter denied plots     plotme.admin.setowner:       描述: Gives the setowner command     plotme.admin.move:       描述: Gives the move command     plotme.admin.weanywhere:       描述: Gives the weanywhere command     plotme.admin.list:       描述: Gives the list command for any players     plotme.admin.buy:       描述: Gives the buy command     plotme.admin.sell:       描述: Gives the sell command for any plots     plotme.admin.auction:       描述: Gives the auction command for any plots     plotme.admin.dispose:       描述: Gives the dispose command for any plots     plotme.admin.done:       描述: Gives the done command for any plots and the donelist command     plotme.admin.addtime:       描述: Gives the addtime command for any plots     plotme.admin.expired:       描述: Gives the expired command     plotme.admin.buildanywhere:       描述: Allows to build anywhere in the plot world     plotme.group.*:       描述: ** players复制代码 配置文件  plotworld: # 世界的名称 # 如果修改世界名称,修改plotworld为新的世界名车 # 你可以拥有多个地皮世界 # 如果有多个世界,复制plotworld下面所有项并修改plotworld为新的世界名车     PlotAutoLimit: 1000 # 使用/plot auto （自动领取地皮指令）的搜索范围 默认是1000 # 如果是1000，表示搜索范围是1000*1000，如果这个范围没有空闲地皮，就好显示一个错误     PathWidth: 7 # 这是路径包括地皮路的宽度 默认是7     PlotSize: 32 # 地皮的大小，默认是32 # 如果是32，则表示每块地皮的大小事32*32即1024个格子     BottomBlockId: '7' # 这是地皮世界的底部，默认是基岩（7）     WallBlockId: '44' # 这是环绕在地皮周围的方块，默认是石台阶（44） # 可以使空气（0）     PlotFloorBlockId: '2' # 这是每块地皮表层的方块，默认是草方块（2）     PlotFillingBlockId: '3' # 这是每块地皮表层的底层之间的方块，默认是泥土（3）     RoadMainBlockId: '5' # 这是路中央的方块，默认是橡木木板（5）     RoadStripeBlockId: '5:2' # 这是路边上的方块，默认是云杉木板（5:2）     RoadHeight: 64 # 这是路的高度（y坐标）。默认是64     DaysToExpiration: 7 # 这是地皮的过期时间（以天为单位），默认为7天 # 设置为0为永不过期，过期的地皮不会被清除，会被添加到/plotme expired 列表     ProtectedBlocks: # 玩家不能打开别的玩家地皮上得容器列表 # 类似领地插件container权限保护 # 如果要删除所有条目，改成ProtectedBlocks: []     - 54     - 61     - 62     - 120     - 94     - 93     - 84     - 25     - 355     - 118     - 117     - 138     - 140     - 145     PreventedItems: # 玩家不能对别的玩家的地皮使用的物品列表 # 如果要删除所有条目，改成PreventedItems: []     - '351:15'     - '259'     - '328'     - '343'     - '342'     - '333'     ProtectedWallBlockId: '44:4' # This is the block the wall will be when the plot is protected.     ForSaleWallBlockId: '44:1' # This is the block the wall will be when the plot is for sale     AuctionWallBlockId: '44:1' # This is the block the wall will be when the plot in auction.     AutoLinkPlots: true # 是否把玩家的地皮联系在一起     DisableExplosion: true # 是否禁用爆炸     DisableIgnition: true # 是否禁用火焰     economy: # 是否启用经济系统（需要Vault） # 如何启动经济系统和下面内容以后更新       UseEconomy: false       CanPutOnSale: false       CanSellToBank: false       RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false       RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false       ClaimPrice: 0.0       ClearPrice: 0.0       AddPlayerPrice: 0.0       DenyPlayerPrice: 0.0       RemovePlayerPrice: 0.0       UndenyPlayerPrice: 0.0       PlotHomePrice: 0.0       CanCustomizeSellPrice: false       SellToPlayerPrice: 0.0       SellToBankPrice: 0.0       BuyFromBankPrice: 0.0       AddCommentPrice: 0.0       BiomeChangePrice: 0.0       ProtectPrice: 0.0       DisposePrice: 0.0 usemySQL: false mySQLconn: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/minecraft mySQLuname: root mySQLpass: password globalUseEconomy: false AdvancedLogging: false Language: english allowWorldTeleport: true defaultWEAnywhere: false auto-update: false allowToDeny: true 复制代码 FAQ: 无法创世神 如何使用创世神 You can safely give your users WorldEdit commands without worrying about them modifying other people's plots. PlotMe uses the //gmask function within WorldEdit to restrict the blocks they can change. Only plots which the player is owner or helper on can be modified by WorldEdit. Your admins can use /plotme weanywhere, to remove the restriction for themselves temporarily to modify roads for example. 你可以给你的玩家worldedit权限而不担心他们修改其他人的地皮。plotme使用//gmask命令可以在限制下用worldedit改变方块块。只有地皮的所有者或助手可以使用worldedit修改自己的地皮。管理员可以使用/plotme weanywhere，去除限制，自己暂时修改公路。 更新记录 Versuib 0.16.3 Fixes a database issue with SQLlite Partially fixes worldedit anywhere. This will be properly fixed in 0.17 This release is compatible with all 0.16.X addons NinjaUpdate Known caveatsThis version might work on some versions of 1.7.9, but it was only tested on 1.8. Use at your own risk on 1.7.9. Will not work on version below 1.7.5 as it relies on new Bukkit functions that provide UUIDs. Offline servers are not supported due to BukkitDev Rules and we also don't support "cracked" servers. Version 0.13f Fixes Nullpointerexception on player loginNullpointerexception when looking at a plot information on a currency plot world Version 0.13de Fixes Made SqlManager.addPlotComment() also accept the same arguments as the previous plotme version. Version 0.13c Additions Updated to use UUIDs on Owner, Current Bidder, Allowed players, Denied players and commenters On first start, server will fetch the UUID of every player in the database. This is made in an asynchronous process and should cause minimal lag to the server.When testing if a player can build in an area, his UUID is now compared instead of his name.Soon Mojang will allow players to change name. To compensate for that, when a player logs on the server, it will verify and update when needed his name on plots. This is also done asynchronously but I believe it could cause issues on dense servers with many many plots. If it becomes a problem, I might turn this into a manual process. The player would need to type a command to update plots with his name.When you set a plot to a player, add a player, deny a player, if that player is not online, it will query the mojang server to fetch his UUID. This way, if the player changes name before he logs back on there is less chance of issues. Fixes Items from Item frames can no longer be removed by unauthorized playersSnowman no longer leave snow behind them (You will see ghost snow but it will be gone if you relog)Fixed the generator to properly use the second value in blocks defined in configuration (i.e RoadMainBlockId: '159:9')Fixed migration from Flat file to SQL where it would not copy the allowed/denied/commentsFixed a typo in a caption when removing denied players Version 0.13bFixes Fix converting database from SQLite to MySQLAdded the captions missing from info command for auctionsFixed error when using plotme home from a non plot worldAdded missing caption MsgNowAllowedFix error when teleporting caused by plugins not teleporting properly (they provide locations with null world) Version 0.13Additions: Added an option to deny players from entering a plot. If you deny someone currently in the plot, they get teleported to the plot home. Added prices to deny and undeny playersThere is a global configuration to enable or disable this feature (allowDeny)Deny * to deny everyone except people allowed on the plotAdds a new table to the database plotmeDenied Added permission node to bypass denial plotme.admin.bypassdenyAdded permission node to build anywhere like what plotme.admin gave: plotme.admin.buildanywhereAdded permission nodes to bypass the protected blocks with plotme.unblock.. Ex: plotme.unblock.54 API changes: Added PlotManager.getPlotHome(world, plot)Changed PlotManager.getPlayersInPlot to now require a World as first argument 完整更新记录   附属插件 站内附属插件 [管理]Plotme Animal——保护地皮动物[1.6.2-1.6.4]（新版本已经不需要） http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-338578-1-1.html [聊天]PlotMe Chat-在地皮里说悄悄话[CB/Spigot1.7~1.8] http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-377166-1-1.html 作者推荐的拓展插件 PlotCheckAsyncWorldEditVoxelSniperRegions PlotMe.jpg (32.1 KB, 下载次数: 8072) 下载附件 2014-7-9 13:12 上传 PlotMe2.jpg (15.11 KB, 下载次数: 7500) 下载附件 2014-7-9 13:12 上传 PlotMe0.13e.zip 2014-7-9 13:10 上传 点击文件名下载附件 155.68 KB, 下载次数: 43530 1.7.9完全汉化版 PlotMe0.13f.zip 2014-7-9 13:10 上传 点击文件名下载附件 155.74 KB, 下载次数: 15252 1.7.9完全汉化版 PlotMe-DefaultGenerator.jar 2015-7-24 08:14 上传 点击文件名下载附件 46.36 KB, 下载次数: 7452 0.17.1 PlotMe-Core.jar 2015-7-24 08:15 上传 点击文件名下载附件 313.71 KB, 下载次数: 14833 0.17.4 PlotMe-0.16.3.zip 2015-7-24 08:15 上传 点击文件名下载附件 439.93 KB, 下载次数: 16350 0.16.3 PlotMe-0.15.2.zip 2015-7-24 08:16 上传 点击文件名下载附件 361.01 KB, 下载次数: 5774 0.15.2

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 1748591300 于 2014-4-23 20:54 编辑 
炫蓝三叶草 发表于 2014-4-23 17:55
那地皮没法用创世神肿么破。。You can safely give your users WorldEdit commands without worrying about them modifying other people's plots. PlotMe uses the //gmask function within WorldEdit to restrict the blocks they can change. Only plots which the player is owner or helper on can be modified by WorldEdit. Your admins can use /plotme weanywhere, to remove the restriction for themselves temporarily to modify roads for example.
这里的意思是
你可以给你的玩家worldedit权限而不担心他们修改其他人的地皮。plotme使用//gmask命令可以在限制下用worldedit改变方块块。只有地皮的所有者或助手可以使用worldedit修改自己的地皮。管理员可以使用/ plotme weanywhere，去除限制，自己暂时修改公路。
